# advent-of-code

Attempting [advent of code](https://adventofcode.com/) 2021 in base R.

I am a massive fan and regular user of the tidyverse, but every now and then I like to remind myself of what life used to be like...

# 1
## a
```{r}
d <- as.numeric(readLines('data/1-input.txt'))
sum(diff(d) > 0)
```

## b
```{r}
r <- sapply(1:(length(d)-length(d)%%3), function(x) sum(d[x:(x+2)]))
sum(diff(r) > 0)
```
